# Pull Request

## Description

Brief description of the changes in this PR.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New skill (adds a new agent skill)
- [ ] Enhancement (improves an existing skill)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)

## Skill(s) Affected

List the skills modified or added:

- 

## Checklist

### Content Quality
- [ ] Skill has proper YAML frontmatter (name and description)
- [ ] Content is clear and well-organized
- [ ] Code examples are included and tested
- [ ] Multiple languages covered (if applicable)
- [ ] Best practices and anti-patterns included
- [ ] Resources and references included

### Documentation
- [ ] README.md updated (if adding new skill)
- [ ] SKILLS_INDEX.md updated (if adding new skill)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated
- [ ] All links are valid and working

### Code Examples
- [ ] All code examples are syntactically correct
- [ ] Examples follow current best practices
- [ ] Examples are complete and runnable
- [ ] Different languages represented (JS/TS, Python, Java, etc.)

### Style & Formatting
- [ ] Markdown is properly formatted
- [ ] Consistent with existing skills' style
- [ ] No spelling or grammar errors
- [ ] Code blocks have proper syntax highlighting

### Testing
- [ ] Tested with GitHub Copilot (if available)
- [ ] Tested with other AI agents (if available)
- [ ] Verified skill is discoverable
- [ ] Examples produce expected results

## How Has This Been Tested?

Describe the tests you ran and the AI agents used:

- [ ] GitHub Copilot in VS Code
- [ ] Claude in Cursor
- [ ] Other: ___________

## Screenshots (if applicable)

If your changes affect how skills appear or are used, add screenshots here.

## Related Issues

Closes #(issue number)

## Additional Notes

Any additional information that reviewers should know.

## Reviewer Checklist

For reviewers:

- [ ] Content is accurate and helpful
- [ ] Examples are correct and appropriate
- [ ] Documentation is complete
- [ ] Style is consistent with other skills
- [ ] No security concerns
- [ ] Ready to merge
